metadata.name: Glwa
metadata.description:
From sugar cane fields to battlefields, united, they created freedom with their hands and their blood to found a nation.

Soti nan chan kann rive nan chan batay, nan tèt ansanm yo te fòje libète ak men yo, ak san yo, pou yo mete doubout yon nasyon.

Des champs de canne-à-sucre aux champs de bataille, unis, ils ont forgé la liberté de leurs mains et de leur sang pour fonder une nation.
